reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: IPPR is an organization with a mission to deliver independent analytical critical yet constructive research on social political and economic issues that affect development in Namibia. The IPPR was established in the belief that development is best promoted through free and critical debate informed by quality research. IPPR is a long term partner of the Embassy of Finland. The Democracy Report 2015-2016 is a continuation to the previous project. The project observes analyses and disseminates information abou t the debate activities and legislative agendas of both the National Council and National Assembly. The project?s output are research papers briefings commentaries and analysis that will enable the Namibian public to better understand the role of parliamen t the legislation debated by parliament and other-related issues concerning parliamentary performance and delivery. The project also aims at briefing the newly elected MP's on relevant research data. In addition the popular Guide to the Namibian Economy is also published within this project. http://www.ippr.org.na/
